room_title: Escape room "Superheroes Hideout" by Escape Now Houston in Houston
review: This was the first time for anyone in our group to try an escape room. We weren't sure what to expect. The employees were all super friendly and very helpful. They took time to explain everything without giving anything away. We did the Superhero room and it was a lot of fun. Although we didn't "escape" - we will be back to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Superheroes Hideout" by Escape Now Houston in Houston
review: We had an incredible experience with the whole family from 7 years old to 40. Looking forward to go again and escape from the room.

room_title: Escape room "Superheroes Hideout" by Escape Now Houston in Houston
review: We decided to go here over the usual bowling/movie/bar ideas for a group outing of family and friends... very happy we did. It was fun, challenging, and hilarious. Some of the clues were very clever and made us feel like geniuses when we solved them. We will definitive back to try the other games.

room_title: Escape room "Superheroes Hideout" by Escape Now Houston in Houston
review: Our family did this together and had a great time, it was definitely a challenge but we escaped!!! We plan to go back and try the other games as well!
